From: "RASPA INFO SERVICE" <info@elspa.ru>

 (multipart/mixed)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain) 
   
Dear Sirs, 
 
The web-site : http://www.asgardro.com/ based on your services is an
illegal server of Ragnarok Online game (Gravity Corp. and Mados, Inc. is
the copyright owner for the online game Ragnarok Online and the
multi-player server software run by Gravity Corp. and Mados, Inc. on its
www.ragnarok.co.kr, www.ragnarokonline.com and www.raggame.ru site.)and
also a source counterfeit goods distributed on the territory of Russia
and CIS states. We ask you to consider this matter and shut down the
web-site. Otherwise, we have the right to turn to Cyber Police and our
partners  and our partners in the North America .         
 
         Best regards, 
 
        Alexey Shcherbakov 
        President of RASPA 
 
        http://www.elspa.ru 
 
        E-mail: alex@elspa.ru
